title: 49 lead letter prints added to "Schriftensammlung"
content:
[Peußisches Bleisatz-Magazin](http://web.archive.org/web/20110301112707/http:/www.bleisetzer.de/cms/front_content.php) added 49 prints of old german lead letter full character sets to its so called  
 [Schriftensammlung (font collection)](http://web.archive.org/)

Thank you all, especially Mike Yanega (with respect.. huhuuu...) for your support helping me to identify these old and wonderful types.

Here's the list...  
You may use the search function "stichwortsuche" down left on the website to find a font you want to see.

Regards,

Georg

Gruppe VII - Antiqua-Varianten - Atrax  
Bauersche Gießerei, Frankfurt am Main  
Erstguß 1926  
Heinrich Jost

Gruppe III - Barock-Antiqua - Concorde normal  
Berthold AG, Berlin  
Erstguß 1969  
Günter Gerhard Lange

Gruppe VI - Serifenlose Linear-Antiqua - Kristall-Grotesk mager  
Norddeutsche Schriftgießerei GmbH,Berlin  
Erstguß 1937  
Hausschnitt

Schriftguß AG, Dresden  
Erstguß 1937  
Arno Drescher

author: Bleisetzer

comments.content:
Hello Georg,  
that’s great news, thanks!  
Your second link isn’t working; here it is: [Schriftensammlung (font collection)](http://web.archive.org/web/20110301112707/http:/www.bleisetzer.de/cms/front_content.php?idcat=41)  
F

Thanks Florian.  
Its easier to build a letterpress form than to type HTML-Codes for me...

Georg

Georg, I was glad to be able to help. I appreciate your site, as it's a great resource for many of us typophiles. You've been generous with your help in the past too.

- Mike Yanega
Thank you for that reference and the time you obviously put into it, Georg. I just spent WAYYY too much time at your second link (but thoroughly enjoyed it)!
